Title: An introduction to the new GitHub Copilot CLI
Description:
Meet the GitHub Copilot CLI, your new coding partner for the command line. We built it to meet you where you work best—the terminal. It's available now for Linux, macOS, and Windows (via WSL) and is extensible with your own MCP servers. We can't wait to see what you build with it.

#GithubCopilotCLI #GitHubCopilot #Terminal

Stay up-to-date on all things GitHub by connecting with us:

YouTube: https://gh.io/subgithub Blog: https://github.blog X: https://twitter.com/github LinkedIn: https://linkedin.com/company/github Insider newsletter: https://resources.github.com/newsletter/ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/github TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@github

About GitHub It’s where over 100 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Author: GitHub
